name: modOpenSoekris
short_description: Modular Perlscript to create bootable OpenBSD images for Soekris hardware. It creates an image which can directly be written to your CF-Card. Support for PPPoE, DNS forwarding, dynamic IP services, DHCP, etc. Based on the great shell script OpenSoekris.
